title: Research about US Regulations
snippet:
We need someone to research the regulations in the United States on the system technical requirements for collecting personal information from customers for business purposes. 

The research should include the system technical requirements of storing, transferring, encrypting, decrypting this information within the system.

We need information on specific guidelines, as well as guidelines related to the healthcare industry and finance.

All applicants must supply one example of a research article they worked on to be considered.

The selected applicant must sign a Non-disclosure Agreement prior to starting the work.
